## Either interface


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Either<L, R = L> extends Functor<R>, Applicative<R>, Monad<R>, Foldable<R>, Iterable<L | R>, Equatable, Hashable, Serializable<Either.JSON<L, R>> 
```
